mapper.insert: insert into mm_bus (firsttime, endtime, `interval`, start, end, runtime, remark, creater, modifier, mid) values (#{firsttime}, #{endtime}, #{interval}, #{start}, #{end}, #{runtime}, #{remark}, #{creater}, #{modifier}, #{mid})
mapper.select:
select count(1) from mm_bus where mid = #{mid}
and( start like concat('%',#{value},'%') or end like concat('%',#{value},'%') or remark like concat('%',#{value},'%'))
